ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: Skip displaying AppStore under project-menu
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ? - [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Steps to reproduce ? AppStore is accessible only for super-admin and configurations are global. Hence skip displaying appStore under project settings menu. Currently we display error on access. ### Desired Behavior Better UX. Avoids confusion https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/issues/4845 ### Project Details Node: **v16.14.0** Arch: **arm64** Platform: **darwin** Docker: **false** RootDB: **sqlite3** PackageVersion: **0.101.2** ### Attachements _No response_

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix(gui): typo correction Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
